documents.document:
Tame Your Recession Worries

Hi friends,

I’ve got a question for you -- Has the recession harmed you and maybe as a result, are worried and losing sleep?

Well, my friend, you are not alone ..

Hi, this is Bart with Worldwide Marketing Group . If that question described you, I know how you feel because I felt the same way. I was, up until recently, in the Real Estate Field. I probably don’t need to tell you how that market evaporated and continues to struggle, even now. When my business started to suffer, I found myself needing an income -- but who would hire a middle aged ex-real estate investor?

Then, one day not too long ago, as I was searching the Internet for options to my dilemma, I came upon an opportunity that has changed my life – I discovered Internet Marketing. What is Internet Marketing you ask? Well, let me explain …

Did you know that there are over 1.5 billion people using the internet worldwide? There are 250 million subscribers on Facebook alone with more & more joining every day?! When I found that out, I thought … “That’s amazing!”

I looked a little deeper and found that with little or no experience and with minimal start-up funds, I could be earning money again almost immediately in my own Internet Marketing business!

I wouldn’t need to have an inventory. I’d have no employees, no storefront, & no territories. I wouldn’t need to pay thousands of dollars to buy a franchise or spend months in training learning how to run that franchise! But I would have A HUGE market to prospect to! And job security! Because I’d have no boss to fire me or let me go in a move to downsize their company … because I AM THE BOSS.
Needless to say – I was excited & I got involved.

This business is easy AND lucrative. I am making more money now and much easier than ever before. I'm only a few weeks away from replacing the same level of income that I lost before the recession hit me.

Now let me tell you, this is not a get-rich-quick deal – you'll have to put some work into it. But if you’re like me and most other folks, I’ll bet that you’re just looking for an opportunity -- one that you can work at and build -- to see the fruits of your labor again.

But this time, in a big way … a much bigger way. Because now when I build, besides earning upfront money, I’m also earning residual income! I’ll tell you more about that in a moment…

Let me tell you that this opportunity provides you with more free time & gives both men and women the ability to take control of your life again. It also gives women something extra, it allows you to be paid what you are really worth.

Did you know ladies that women are only paid 77¢ on the dollar, on average, for what men make? That never seemed fair to me. Does it to you? You put in the same hours and expend at least the same energy – I say, you should be paid the same for the same work.

Well I promise you this, in this business you will be paid on your performance, not on your gender!

So folks if you feel underpaid, undervalued or overworked isn’t it about time that you take action to get your life back on track too? No more worries about your future. No more tossing & turning and sleepless nights. Instead, couldn’t you use more time with the family or vacations while all the time still earning an income? Even while you are sleeping!

Wait how do we do that you ask? Here’s one of the best parts! Remember when I mentioned Residual Income? Do you know what that is? Well, it’s like Royalties ”. You know what that is …

Authors receive a "royalty" every time we buy one of their books.

Recording artists earn a "royalty" every time one of their songs are played on the radio.

Jerry Seinfeld receives a "syndication fee" or “royalty” every time that one of his Seinfeld sitcoms is played on T.V.

Insurance agents receive a "renewal" or “royalty” every time that you pay your life, health or car insurance bill to protect whatever item you have insured.

Those are all "Royalties".

The point I want to make here is that they continue to be paid for work that they only had to do once! Somebody sends them a check again & again & again for work already only completed once!

That's also called "residual income" and it can make you RICH!

The same is true in my business -- and it can also be true in yours, too. Are you still trading your time for hourly pay helping someone else get rich? Or did you if you are now unemployed?

Here’s a question for you …. Why is it that some people who work a 40 hour week earn $30,000 per year while another person working the same 40 hour week will earn $100,000 per year and yet a third person working a 40 hour week will earn $500,000 per year? Why is that?

For the highly paid person, it's called "leveraging". Leveraging your time or talents or business can make you rich.

Isn’t that amazing? One guy or gal works 40 hours in a week & earns $30,000 a year and another one working the same 40 hours, makes $500,000 in a year! We need to put that to work for us! Show me where the line starts so that I can sign up for that!

Did you know that 5% of workers in the United States are small business owners that make the lion's share of the money earned -- the other 95% work for wages (folks trading time for money). They work for those business owners to help make them wealthy. Which category would you rather you and your family to be in?

Isn't it about time that you checked into how “Leveraging your time” – Getting paid through “Royalties” -- works and put it to work for you?

If this makes sense to you, like it did for me, then follow the links for FREE REPORT .

Look, if I can learn to do it at 59 years old with little computer skills, then I know that you can too!

Register now – Here’s to your better future.

Click Here to register for my FREE REPORT today!

Bart

Join Our 2010 FHTM Kickoff

Hi, this is Bart with Worldwide Marketing Group.

I'd like to spend a few minutes with you and ask you a question...

How has your income been this past year or the past several years, honestly?

It wasn't too long ago that mine was just bumping along through the beginning of 2009 -- You see I was a real estate investor and when the housing market collapsed, so did my income. But I had bigger aspirations and goals than to just sit by and wait for the economy to pick back up or wait for the government to get its act together to try to fix the mess that affected me.

I heard a great speaker, Mr. Jim Rohn say once that "The key to your better future, is you." Wise words. Moving words.

I would imagine that as an achiever or possibly a small business owner, an entrepreneur -- that you'd like to be back to producing ample amounts of income too. Am I right?

One of the reasons that I got into the Fortune Hi Tech Marketing business besides replacing the income that I used to enjoy in my small business, is because I see the easy opportunity for folks like us to use the Fortune vehicle to do it. Whether it is we who have run businesses before, or the person who has lost a job; we still have a desire to accomplish something big. And we all know tens to hundreds of unemployed folks -- many with the "fire in their belly" who still want to do more than just "get by". These folks are just looking for the right opportunity to have employment and a chance to make an abundant income -- this business fits for them too.

Fortune is not just for the regular man or woman on the street either -- the list of super accomplishers in Fortune is growing.

Just look at the government officials, corporate giants and celebrities who have joined us:
* Bob and Maureen McDonnell – The Newly Elected Governor of Virginia
* Jim and Betty Miles – Jim is the Former Secretary of State of South Carolina
* Judith Hammer Schmidt – A Former Asst. Attorney to the President
* Kenneth D. Lewis- Former CEO and President of Bank of America
* Jerry Rice- NFL Hall of Fame wide receiver for the world champion San Francisco 49'ers
Just to name a few.
We all know doctors & dentists whose income stops when they turn out the lights in their office and leave for the night. These, and other achievers, gravitate to a business like this where they can continue earning without the normal overhead and hassle of a traditional business. Maybe these folks, and possibly you, are tired of dealing with the problems associated with a staff of 5-20 employees -- but still want to achieve & be more profitable -- they are just waiting to be shown an opportunity -- this opportunity! They'll eventually see it from someone, why not us? Why not you?

Then, my last question:

What do you want from an opportunity?

Additional income ? To pay off nagging debts? Replace a lost retirement account or like me, a lost income? To feel the joy of owning a business that allows you to feel worthwhile and accomplish again? To help others earn again? Gaining financial independence once and for all?

Whatever your "Why" is, you have been waiting for an opportunity (a vehicle) to make it come true. With effort, I believe without a doubt, that this opportunity will work for you, as it already has for me and so many others. Plus, also work for other people that you show it to; maybe friends of yours or relatives that have been affected by this poor economy. Folks who will "see it" and want the same opportunity too! Who do you know that would like a 2nd chance? We all know someone.

What is your "Why" for putting the effort in to build a business or another business? Tell me and I promise that together, we'll work to make your reasons come to pass.

This is a ground floor opportunity in all parts of the U.S., Canada, Puerto Rico and the U.K. right now. But it's too good of an idea to remain out of the spotlight for long and as I said, someone is going to eventually show it to the people in your area. Why not you?

And with the use of the internet and Internet Marketing your business has the potential to explode! There are no territories – we can market wherever Fortune is!

Fortune has too good of a marketing idea and is too good of a company not to catch on BIG! There are only 200,000 reps in the company worldwide at this time, with other countries scheduled to open up in the future as the company grows. What happens when there are 2,000,000 reps? Or 4,000,000 reps? When that happens, how many of those folks will you be able to look back on and say are helping you in your business?

For the price of a new business suit you could be in your own business today!

We have an abundance of training available and the ability to teach you how to market your business through the use of the internet, too!

I have set up an internet marketing program to reach out to the masses for my business. With the hunger for work and opportunity so intense right now there are people out there looking for us but don't know how to find us. I have created videos for youtube , facebook , myspace, twitter and other marketing media sites as well to drive folks to respond, to ask for more information and join our team; I can teach you how to do this too.
99.9 percent of the population does not even know how to market on the internet -- but I do

There are 1.5 billion people worldwide using the internet now and that number is growing DAILY! Facebook alone has 250,000,000 users. Internet marketing is the future and the future is NOW!

And those of you who are on this team, in business with me, will be the beneficiaries too, because I can teach you how to market to the masses. That's right, not only will you benefit from your own marketing efforts with signing up new reps, but the way that this opportunity is designed, it benefits all of us for me to use my marketing skills to grow your business with my expertise as well.

Finally, let me say that opportunity is like steam from a teapot -- you see it now and then it is gone. This ship is going to sail for the "new world" with or without you -- the question is, "will you be on it"? Your ship is about to sail and this is your invitation to be onboard -- don't miss the boat. What are you waiting for? Contact me today to be a part of the best team in Fortune!

Come join me > and make 2010 a turning point in your lives and the lives of others that you know. Let's build something big together in our communities, the country and the world -- a business that you can be proud of. A business that will last and that no one can take away from you again!

Look, if I can learn to do it at 59 years old with little computer skills, I know that you can too!

Here’s to your better future, I’ll see you on the other side.

Click here to register for my FREE REPORT today.

Bart

Learn Internet Marketing the Right Way With Worldwide Marke

Hi friends, this is Bart.
In this time together I’d like to introduce you to Worldwide Marketing Group.
Worldwide Marketing Group is a company that is a leader in internet marketing and lifestyle development.
When I first discovered internet marketing I had the desire to replace the income that I had lost because of the recession. I didn’t want to ever have to worry about money again. I wanted to earn an abundant income but I had little knowledge of how to do it through the structure of internet marketing. Then after some preliminary research I found some truly amazing statistics! This is what I found …
Did you know that there are over 1.5 billion people today using the internet worldwide? And that number is growing DAILY! There are over 250 million subscribers on Facebook alone! I thought… “That’s amazing! I see an opportunity here.”

I looked a little deeper and found that with little or no experience and with minimal start-up funds, I could be earning money again almost immediately in my own internet marketing business! And I’d avoid monster franchise fees and not have months’ worth of training before making money.

I found an abundance of guidance and training online from folks like Jonathan Budd and Rich Schefren – both experts in the field of internet marketing. Teachers who were willing to share their knowledge for free in many cases! I was able to quickly acquire that knowledge and start earning an income again within no time at all!

Maybe your situation was like mine… My story is simple. I was, up until recently, in the Real Estate Field. I probably don’t need to tell you how that market evaporated and continues to struggle, even now. When my business started to suffer, I found myself needing to replace my former income, which had been large -- but who would hire a 59 year old ex-entrepreneur?
But not wanting to just sit around and feel sorry for myself, I did something about it. I started checking out the web looking for another viable business. That’s how I discovered the opportunities in Internet Marketing.
I found that I didn’t even have to have my own products to market – there were valuable products available for consumers, through Affiliate Marketing programs with big, reputable companies. Terrific products with companies that I could “piggyback” on and “joint venture” with to promote their products. This allowed me to offer these quality products and be paid a commission on them to promote through my own company over the internet. In some cases, sometimes, very big commissions! And, “Residual Income or Royalties” – I’ll tell you more about that in a moment.
I didn’t need to stock an inventory, no storefront, no employees and no territories. I could join other network marketing companies like Fortune Hi Tech Marketing or url=http://www.melaleuca.com/]Melaleuca[/url] and offer their products to millions of potential customers – worldwide! And that’s just the tip of the iceberg, my friends – there are hundreds of companies with thousands of products looking for you and me to help them offer their products to millions of people over the internet.
That got me very excited – I saw the potential!
Maybe you see it too? I invite you to follow the link below for my FREE REPORT on how to find out the path for you to create your own better future right away – just like I did.
I’ll leave you with one last thought to ponder --
Here’s a question for you … Why is it that some people who work a 40 hour week earn $30,000 per year while another person working the same 40 hour week will earn $100,000 per year and yet a third person working a 40 hour week will earn $500,000 per year? Why is that?

It's a concept called "leveraging". Leveraging your time or talents or business can make you RICH. Isn’t that amazing? We all need to put that to work for us!

Did you know that 5% of workers in the United States are small business owners that make the lion's share of the money earned -- the other 95% work for wages. They are folks trading their time for a paycheck. They work for those small business owners to help make them wealthy. And then could, at any time, get downsized or fired. Which category would you rather you and your family to be in?

Isn't it about time that you checked into how “Leveraging your time” works – Getting paid “Royalties” – and put it to work for you? Like I am …

But this time I’m doing it in a big way, a much bigger way. Because now when I build my business, besides earning upfront money, I’m also earning residual income! “Royalties” that get paid over & over & over again to me for work that you only have to do once... and you can have this same business too.

Let me tell you though, that this opportunity provides you with not only income, but more free time & gives men and women the ability to take control of your life again. It also allows women the ability to be paid what you are worth.

Did you know ladies; that women are only paid 77¢ on the dollar on average, for what men make? That never seemed fair to me. Does it to you? Of course not! You put in the same hours and expend at least the same energy, sometimes more! – I say, you should be paid at least the same for the same work.

Well I promise you this, in this business you will be paid on your performance, not on your gender!

So folks, if you feel underpaid, undervalued or overworked, then isn’t it about time that you take action to get your life back on track too? Could you use more time with the family or on vacations while all the time still earning an income? Even while you are sleeping through being paid royalties!

I have provided a FREE REPORT on my website that can help you get started today!

Here’s to your better future, I’ll see you on the other side.

Click here to register for my FREE REPORT today.

Bart

Learn How to Earn Big Money With Royalties Pt. 1

Hi, this is Bart with Worldwide Marketing Group. Would you like to earn money even while you’re sleeping?
How do I do that you ask.
Through the exciting but little known secret of earning “Residual Income” or "Royalties”.
Here’s a question for you… Why is it that some people who work a 40 hour week earn $30,000 per year while another person working the same 40 hour week will earn $100,000 per year and yet a third person working a 40 hour week will earn $500,000 per year? Why is that?

For the highly paid person, it's called "leveraging". Leveraging your time, talents or business which can make you RICH!

Wait, now how do I do that? Here’s one of the most exciting & best kept secrets ever! Remember when I mentioned residual income? Do you know what that is? Well, it’s like “Royalties”. You know what that is …

Authors receive a "royalty" every time we buy one of their books.

Recording artists earn a "royalty" every time one of their songs is played on the radio.

Jerry Seinfeld receives a "syndication fee" or “royalty” every time that one of his Seinfeld sitcoms is played on T.V.

Those are all "Royalties".

The point I want you to see here is that they continue to be paid for work that they only had to do once! Somebody sends them a check again & again & again for work that they already completed once!

That's also called "residual income" and, as I said, it can make you RICH!

Isn't it about time that you checked into how “Leveraging your time” – and getting paid through “Royalties” works and put it to work for you?

When I saw this I thought, “Isn’t that amazing? One guy or gal works 40 hours in a week & earns $30,000 a year and another one working the same 40 hours, makes $500,000 in a year! We need to put that to work for us! Show me where the line starts so that I can sign up for that!”

If this makes sense to you, like it did for me, then follow the links for my FREE REPORT , to help you learn about how to earn royalties. It can work for you like it works for me. You’ve got nothing to lose and like me, you too can regain control of your life and earn what you are really worth!

Look, if I can learn to do it at 59 years old with little computer skills, then I know that you can too!

I have provided a FREE REPORT on my website that can help you get started today!

Here’s to your better future, I’ll see you on the other side.

Click here to register for my FREE REPORT today.

Bart

When I first discovered internet marketing I had the desire to replace the income that I had lost because of the recession. I didn’t want to ever have to worry about money again. When I saw this I thought, “Isn’t that amazing? One guy or gal works 40 hours in a week & earns $30,000 a year and another one working the same 40 hours, makes $500,000 in a year! We need to put that to work for us! Show me where the line starts so that I can sign up for that!”
Isn't it about time that you checked into how “Leveraging your time” works – learning how to get paid through “Royalties” -- and put it to work for you?
If this makes sense to you, like it did for me, then sign up for my FREE REPORT, to help you learn about how to earn royalties. I did and it can work for you like it works for me. You’ve got nothing to lose and like me, you too can regain control of your life and earn what you are really worth!
Look, if I can learn to do this at 59 years old with little computer skills, then I know that you can too!

Here’s to your better future, I’ll see you on the other side.

Bart

Equal Pay & Job Security for Women Pt.1

Hi, this is Bart with Worldwide Marketing Group . Let’s talk about the future – let’s talk about internet marketing. Have you seen some of the headlines lately?

“Jobs In Corporate America Are Disappearing”
“The Only Job Security In Life These days Is Self-Reliance”

As if we didn’t already know this …
Well how would you like me to show you how to run a money making business?

Answer These Questions:
Are You Tired Of Being Underpaid, Undervalued And Overworked?
Isn’t It About Time That You Got Paid What You Are Really Worth?
Isn’t It Time That You Locked In Job Security For Yourself And Your Family?

To the ladies watching, here’s a sobering statistic -- Did you know that women earn 77 cents on the dollar compared with men? I think that’s terrible! And unfair! In most cases, you work as hard and the same hours – yet are paid less.
Ladies, if you want this to change, this is my offer to women
In this business I can promise you that you will be paid on the basis of your performance, not on your gender.

And, this is my offer to men :
Here’s an opportunity to put you in control again & take your life back from the 40 hour work week.

Folks, do you have big dreams but no idea; or maybe lost the idea of how to achieve them? If so then there is a place for you in this field, let me show you how to build a business that will last and pays HUGE dividends.

Some of the Benefits Include:

You can Work From Home Either Part-Time Or Full-Time
You can Set Your Own Hours
Develop A Phenomenal Pay Plan
You can Be Your Own Boss
In some cases, receive a New Car Allowance and Company Trips
Work with International Companies

Plus, and here’s one of the GREATEST benefits of all – build residual income which means that you:
Build your business only once and then get paid as it continues to grow – even while you sleep!
Sign up on my website for my FREE REPORT to get a fresh start at earning a big income. It can work for you like it works for me. You’ve got nothing to lose and like me, you too can regain control of your life and earn what you are really worth!

Look, if I can learn to do it at 59 years old with little computer skills, then I know that you can too!

Here’s to your better future, I’ll see you on the other side.

Click here to register for my FREE REPORT today.

Bart

Equal Pay & Job Security for Women Pt.2

Do you have to work in this environment and keep a house, husband and children too? Are you feeling sad that maybe you are not spending enough time with the kids? Maybe you feel like your life is passing you by but you feel trapped and don’t see a way out…

Well, how would you like me to show you how to run a money making business through proven systems & technology? Let’s talk a moment about internet marketing …

I can promise you that you will be paid on the basis of your performance, not on your gender. Wouldn’t that be great? And you’ll be around to spend time with the husband and enjoy your kids growing up and still be making money while doing it!
I want to show you A PROVEN opportunity to put you in control again & take your life back.
If you have big dreams but no idea, or lost the idea, of how to

Sign up on my website for my FREE REPORT to get a fresh start at earning a big income. It can work for you like it works for me. You’ve got nothing to lose and like me, you too can regain control of your life and earn what you are really worth!

Bart

Explode Your Earnings & Kill Recession Worries

Hi, this is Bart with Worldwide Marketing Group .
If you’re worried about money or losing sleep at night because of the economy; or maybe worried about funding for your retirement, then I have some good news for you!
I know how you feel because at the end of 2009 I was the person that I just described. But now, I want to tell you about something that is working for me and has changed all of that.
Let me introduce you to internet marketing! This is a quick and easy way, no matter what your age or gender, to make an incredible part-time or full-time income.
If you’ve got a few minutes to spare, I invite you right now to check out how you can start TODAY on a road to improving your finances. With little or no prior experience and limited resources, you can build your own internet marketing business from scratch and start receiving income in a matter of just a few days.
Did you know that there are over 1.5 billion people using the internet worldwide? There are over 250 million subscribers on Facebook alone! When I found that out, I thought… “That’s amazing – there’s an opportunity here!” And I was right!

The internet is growing exponentially and the internet marketing business is EXPLODING! And it’s just now beginning – 99.9% of the folks using computers have no idea of the information that I’m going to tell you about! You may have no idea how BIG this is…yet. But if I have described your situation and you are looking for a path to big income, then you need to look a little further! It could, very well be the answer that you are searching for!
Sign up on my website for my FREE REPORT to get a fresh start at earning a big income. It can work for you like it works for me. You’ve got nothing to lose and like me, you too can regain control of your life and earn what you are really worth!

Look, if I can learn to do it at 59 years old with little computer skills, then I know that you can too!

Here’s to your better future, I’ll see you on the other side.

Click here to register for my FREE REPORT today.

Bart

Explode Your Income With Part-Time or Full-Time Effort

Toward the end of 2008 I was pretty much broke and had few prospects. I had lost my income in the recession as the real estate market fell apart. I was down, but not out, and was looking for a way to produce an income again. Either part-time or full-time, I just needed a track to run on. That’s when I discovered internet marketing.
Hi, my friends, this is Bart with Worldwide Marketing Group .
Worldwide Marketing has become a leader in internet marketing and lifestyle development.
As I said, when I first discovered internet marketing I had the desire to replace the income that I had lost because of the recession. I didn’t want to ever have to worry about money again. I wanted to earn an abundant income but I had little knowledge of how to do it through the structure of internet marketing. Then after some preliminary research I found some truly amazing statistics! Here’s what I found …
Did you know that there are over 1.5 billion people today using the internet worldwide? And that number is growing DAILY! There are over 250 million subscribers on Facebook alone! I thought … “That’s amazing!” I saw an opportunity.

I looked a little deeper and found that with little or no experience and with minimal start-up funds, I could be earning money again almost immediately in my own internet marketing business! And I’d avoid monster franchise fees and not have to go through months’ worth of training in a franchise before making money.

If you’re worried about money or losing sleep at night because of the economy or maybe worried about funding for your retirement like I was, then I have some good news for you!
I know how you feel because at the end of 2009 I was the person that I just described. But now I want to tell you about something that has changed all of that and is working for me!
Let me introduce YOU to internet marketing! It’s a quick and easy way, no matter what your age or gender, to make an incredible part-time or full-time income.

FHTM - not a pyramid scheme - Part 1

Hi, this is Bart with Worldwide Marketing Group
You’ve chosen to ask me the question today, “Is Fortune Hi-Tech Marketing an illegal pyramid scheme?”
That’s a legitimate question and I’m here to tell you that it is NOT.
Let me explain the definition of a pyramid or ponzi scheme – first, it is ILLEGAL ! Think of Bernie Madoff who is currently serving 150 years in prison for defrauding investors recently out of billions of dollars. Second, in pyramid or ponzi schemes the company has no worthwhile products to sell. The crook uses the incoming money that the new folks are investing to pay returns to the people who have already invested their money in the business – but there is no product being offered or sold to generate any of this income… just the crook recycling the money from the new folks to pay off the old. Until the incoming money flow stops, the crook gets caught, and the scheme falls apart.
This is where FHTM and every other legitimate company that uses network marketing to promote sales differs from the illegal model just explained. FHTM is a marketing company with a sales team and generates revenue from the advertisers that are paying FHTM for the privilege of having the Fortune sales force market their products.
These reputable advertisers; Verizon, AT&T, Sprint, Travelocity, Peter Lamas, True Essentials and hundreds of other advertisers know they can receive more product sales from their advertising budget by using a direct marketing sales force than using TV or print advertising.
With the introduction of TIVO, TV ads are being fast-forwarded & skipped, not watched by consumers. Print media, like newspapers & magazines are slowly dying because of the internet and ease by which folks can get their news. This means more ineffective print media ads. So advertisers realize that direct marketing like FHTM is extremely valuable to them and they are willing to pay to use the Fortune sales team. That means big revenues for Fortune and we who are working in it. We are being paid for our effectiveness in marketing the products of these terrific companies.
We can offer these products to friends and relatives and to total strangers through the use of the internet. This is a quick and easy way, no matter what your age or gender, to make an incredible part-time or full-time income.
Did you know that there are over 1.5 billion people using the internet worldwide? There are over 250 million subscribers on part-time or full-time alone! And you could be marketing to a HUGE audience with the right effort!

FHTM – Not A Pyramid Scam? - Part 2

Hi, this is Bart with Worldwide Marketing Group .
Let’s talk about the question “Is Fortune Hi Tech Marketing an illegal pyramid scheme”.
That’s a legitimate question and I’m here to tell you that it is NOT. Let me explain.
Let’s approach this from another direction. Let’s use logic. Do you consider any big, successful company a pyramid scheme?
Look at – IBM, Apple, Phizer, General Mills, Hershey’s Candies, Mutual of Omaha insurance company or any other big, successful company that you want to name. These would not be considered pyramid schemes, right? Yet let’s look at their structure.
In each case they have a Chairman of the company who sits at the top, then another top tier of management below him or her like a CEO and then many Vice Presidents of this and that section of the company below that, then division managers below them, then below that, many department managers, then many hundreds of employees and finally a huge sales force which encompasses all of the distributors of the company’s particular products. Now step back and look at this structure – what’s it look like? Looks like a pyramid to me, with the Chairman at the very top. Doesn’t it to you? But there’s nothing illegal about it.
Let me explain the definition of an ILLEGAL pyramid or ponzi scheme now – first, it is ILLEGAL ! There are crooks involved! When you think of this, think of Bernie Madoff who is currently serving 150 years in prison for defrauding investors out of billions of dollars. Second, in pyramid or ponzi schemes, the company has no worthwhile products to sell. The crook uses the new incoming money that the new folks are investing to pay returns to the people who have already invested their money and are in the business already – but there is no product being offered or sold to generate any new income. It’s a “borrow from Peter to pay Paul” structure and destined for eventual failure.
This is where FHTM and every other legitimate company that uses network marketing to promote sales differs from the illegal model just explained. FHTM is a marketing company with a sales team that is paid revenue from the advertisers that are paying FHTM for the privilege of having the Fortune sales force market their products for them.

There are hundreds of reputable advertisers, like Verizon, AT&T, and on and on, who know that they can receive more mileage from their advertising budgets with using the Fortune sales force to market their products than using TV or print advertising. With the invention of TIVO, TV ads are being skipped & not watched by consumers. Print media, like newspapers & magazines are slowly dying so advertisers realize that direct marketing through companies like FHTM is extremely valuable to them and they are willing to pay BIG advertising fees to use the Fortune sales team. That means big revenues for Fortune and we who are working in it. Quite simply, we are being paid for our effectiveness in marketing the products of terrific companies.
We can offer these products to friends and relatives and to total strangers through the use of the internet. We make great incomes, Fortune makes money, the advertisers and the consumers are happy. Everybody wins!
If this method of making an attractive part-time or full-time income is of interest to you then let me also introduce you to Internet Marketing! This is a quick and easy way, no matter what your age or gender, to make an incredible part-time or full-time income while building your own business.
Did you know that there are over 1.5 billion people using the internet worldwide? There are over 250 million subscribers on Facebook alone! And you could be marketing to a HUGE audience with the right effort!

For Women - Become A Corporate Leader in Your Company

Hi, friends, this is Bart with Worldwide Marketing Group .
Today I want to share with you one woman’s thoughts about her beginnings in her home-based business:
“I began scanning the local paper for a job that would pay the bills but give me time to spend with my children. On the help wanted page three magic words leapt out at me; work from home. And like 9 out of 10 of us I signed up with small, short-term goals; to pay the mortgage until my children were old enough for me to return to teaching.
I had a rocky start, my self-confidence was zero. I wore long skirts at my parties so people wouldn’t see my knees shaking. I discriminated against anyone who looked like a great prospect assuming she wouldn’t be interested. Even if she was I lacked the confidence to approach her. It took a few months to realize I had stumbled into a career that could literally change my life.
Network marketing meant I could be a great mom to my kids, I could help pay the bills and I could enjoy a life most people only dreamt about, all at the same time. Network marketing tops the list of career choices for women. No job comes close to matching it.
Single, married, separated, divorced or widowed, the chips are seriously stacked against women in the financial stakes. The U.S. census bureau reports women earn 77 cents for doing the same job a man is paid a dollar to do. The more educated women are the worse they fare, according to figures compiled by the Department of Education. One year out of college women earn 80% as much as their male counterparts. Each year the disparity stretches, ten years out of college they’re earning only 69%.
Women contribute more than half the family income in 55% of households. But you don’t find these alpha earnings in corporations. Out of all of the fortune 500 corporations a measly 13 have female CEOs; four out of five have no women anywhere near to the top of the echelons. Where are the alpha earners? They’re in entrepreneurial enterprises like network marketing where the majority of high earners are women. That doesn’t surprise me. Every woman who reaches the top level is helping another woman work up to join her. There is always room for more at the top of our industry. And the only way to reach it is to help others succeed.
Compare that to the competitive environment that marks most workplaces. If you are one of the 25,000 women who start a network marketing business every day in the United States, shout it from the rooftops and be very loud so that other women can hear you.
Encourage career women to stop swimming against the corporate tide and to start building their own pool. Encourage young women to consider network marketing as the first choice of career not as a fallback job when they marry have children or lose faith in the corporate system. Tell them “In network marketing you’ll be paid on the basis of your performance, not on your sex.” And the majority of high income earners are women.
It is not just about the high-flyers, talk to the women who hold jobs well below their skills, experience and education after taking a break to raise a family.
Talk to all the women who work in low-paid, low-satisfaction jobs in shops, offices and factories. Offer them a chance to escape from the 9-5 drudgery to a business that is profitable energizing and fun. Life is too short to toil at a dull job where you will be underappreciated and underpaid.
Anyone who has raised a family has management skills, anyone who runs a home has organizational skills, women are tailor-made to become network marketers. We thrive on multitasking and the skills needed to succeed which are sharing, building relationships and nurturing, and they’re second-nature to us. We instinctively do what needs to be done.
Women already own 40% of all private businesses and 70% of all start-ups but costs can dissuade many woman entrepreneurs from starting their own business.
Now listen to this, let your prospects know that in network marketing the corporation invests in them. Explain how little a starter kit costs and that the corporation contributes products, training and support of far greater value. Tell them that they risk nothing when they start and if it’s not the right fit they can walk away having lost nothing.
Talk to married women, marriage is no free pass to financial freedom. Spouses lose their jobs or take pay-cuts all the time. Divorce rates are skyrocketing and the average age of widowhood in America is 55.
20% of all homebuyers are unmarried women according to the joint center for housing studies at Harvard University. Women who work are better equipped to manage when things go sour, no question about it.
Talk to single women, running a small business can be lonely, in network marketing you’re in business for yourself but not by yourself. You’ll have support on a daily basis and many opportunities to swap ideas and gain friends and inspiration at training meetings, at conventions and on incentive vacations.
Network marketing may be the best kept secret in the United States and there has never been a better time to spread the word loud and proud.”

This was written by Mary Christensen in, “Be A Recruiting Superstar”. She started out scared but determined and has risen to the top of her field. She discovered putting her own business together wasn’t “rocket science” and she could have the opportunity to make it too.
After reading this, ask yourself the following questions:
Are You Tired Of Being Underpaid, Undervalued And Overworked?
Isn’t It About Time That You Got Paid What You Are Really Worth?
Isn’t It Time That You Locked In Job Security For Yourself And Your Family?

If you answered yes to any of these questions then an internet network marketing business could be your solution!
